channel.title: CVE Feed for vinsdragonis -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-36030|2024-08-03T09:51:59.906Z -- vinsdragonis -- project-nexus
item.description: Project-nexus is a general-purpose blog website framework. Affected versions are subject to SQL injection due to a lack of sensitization of user input. This issue has not yet been patched. Users are advised to restrict user input and to upgrade when a new release becomes available.
